Be a Part of Something Bigger: Jadilah Bagian dari Sesuatu yang Besar
Everything that we make is 100% open sou: Semua yang kita buat adalah 100% open source dan dikembangkan bersama oleh orang-orang dari seluruh dunia. Meskipun Anda bukan seorang programmer, Anda bisa terlibat dan membuat perbedaan.
The biggest way to help out elementary i: Cara terbesar untuk membantu elementary adalah dengan pendanaan. Dengan bantuan Anda, kita sudah bisa tumbuh dari semula hanya sekelompok kecil relawan menjadi sebuah perusahaan kecil.
BountySource puts funds directly in the: BountySource menyalurkan dana imbalan langsung kepada pengembang yang telah melakukan perbaikan atau membuat fitur baru. Tawarkan imbalan kepada pengembang untuk memperbaiki masalah yang berarti bagi Anda. Anda juga dapat menyalurkan dana terus-menerus secara otomatis.
Patreon works like an ongoing crowdfundi: Patreon bekerja layaknya kampanye urun dana. Tentukan jumlah sumbangan, dapatkan timbal balik, dan bantu kami mencapai tujuan kami.
PayPal is a quick and easy solution. Cho: PayPal adalah solusi yang cepat dan mudah. Anda dapat memilih untuk menyumbang sekali atau menyumbang terus-menerus secara otomatis.
elementary OS is created and used by peo: OS elementary dibuat dan digunakan oleh orang-orang dari seluruh dunia; bantu kami menciptakan pengalaman yang lebih baik dengan menerjemahkannya ke dalam bahasa lain.
elementary OS uses an open, collaborativ: OS elementary menggunakan alat penerjemahan yang terbuka dan kolaboratif di Launchpad bernama Rosetta.
Our website is also openly translated us: Situs web kami juga terbuka untuk diterjemahkan menggunakan sebuah platform online bernama Transifex.
StackExchange is a Q&A website built aro: StackExchange is a Q&A website built around finding the best answers to common questions. Anyone can create an account to start asking and answering.
elementary provides basic documentation: elementary provides basic documentation for both users and developers. All of our documentation is written in Markdown and hosted on GitHub, so submitting a change or a new section is a piece of cake.
Our website is built using HTML, CSS, PH: Our website is built using HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript. We're always looking for people experienced in those areas who would like to contribute and make it even better.
Our desktop environment and all its apps: Our desktop environment and all its apps are built using Vala, GTK+, Granite, and a number of other open libraries. We host our desktop code on Launchpad.net, a free service for open source projects. If you've never developed for elementary OS before, we recommend you check out our Getting Started guide.
This burndown chart shows our progress f: This burndown chart shows our progress for the Loki RC 1 milestone, which is our current development focus. Soon after that milestone is reached, Loki will be publically released and work on the next version of elementary OS will begin. Learn More
Every project begins with an idea. Our D: Every project begins with an idea. Our Design Team takes these and turns them into clear blueprints and bug reports. We break up design into two main components:
We're always open to new ideas for eleme: We're always open to new ideas for elementary OS's visual design. Get started by sharing mockups with
We use a system on Launchpad called Blue: We use a system on Launchpad called Blueprints to create detailed explanations of new features and changes to the user interface.
